title: Bigoli with spicy sausage tomato sauce
ingredients: ['450g bigoli pasta or spaghetti', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 pork sausages, casings removed', '1/2 glass white wine', '500g passata', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried red chilli flakes']
